languages.text: За дверью обнаружились потеки странной слизистой субстанции, островки чего-то, напоминающего мох, и свисающие с потолка образования. Исследование показало, что зеркало активно выделяет биомассу, включая споры быстрорастущей плесени.

traits.locale_text: За дверью обнаружились потеки странной слизистой субстанции, островки чего-то, напоминающего мох, и свисающие с потолка образования. Исследование показало, что зеркало активно выделяет биомассу, включая споры быстрорастущей плесени.

languages.text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.
languages.original_text: За дверью обнаружились потеки странной слизистой субстанции, островки чего-то, напоминающего мох, и свисающие с потолка образования. Исследование показало, что зеркало активно выделяет биомассу, включая споры быстрорастущей плесени.

traits.locale_text: Strange streaks of slimy substance can be found behind the door, interspersed with bits of squamous moss and fetid growths hanging from the ceiling. Observation shows that the mirror is actively leaking biomass, including fast-growing mold spores.

Strange streaks of slimy substance can be found behind the door, interspersed with bits of squamous moss and fetid growths hanging from the ceiling. Observation shows that the mirror is actively leaking biomass, including fast-growing mold spores.

Strange streaks of slimy substance can be found behind the door, interspersed with bits of squamous moss and fetid growths hanging from the ceiling. Observation shows that the mirror is actively leaking biomass, including fast-growing mould spores.

The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

languages.text: 打开舱门之后，船员们看到了某种古怪粘稠物质留下的条纹，其中夹杂着某些看起来像苔藓的东西。天花板上还有什么东西垂了下来。进一步检查显示，镜子正在不断地分泌生物物质，其中包括快速生长的霉菌孢子。
languages.original_text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

traits.locale_text: 打开舱门之后，船员们看到了某种古怪粘稠物质留下的条纹，其中夹杂着某些看起来像苔藓的东西。天花板上还有什么东西垂了下来。进一步检查显示，镜子正在不断地分泌生物物质，其中包括快速生长的霉菌孢子。

languages.text: La puerta se abre para revelar restos de una sustancia viscosa no identificada salpicada de lo que parecen acumulaciones de moho y lo que parecen matorrales colgando del techo. Un análisis más detallado muestra que el espejo está secretando materia orgánica, incluyendo esporas de moho de crecimiento rápido.
languages.original_text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

traits.locale_text: La puerta se abre para revelar restos de una sustancia viscosa no identificada salpicada de lo que parecen acumulaciones de moho y lo que parecen matorrales colgando del techo. Un análisis más detallado muestra que el espejo está secretando materia orgánica, incluyendo esporas de moho de crecimiento rápido.

languages.text: ドアを開けると、コケのようなものが点々と付着した、奇妙なヌメヌメとした筋が天井から伸びている。さらに観察してみると、増殖スピードの早いカビの胞子を含むバイオマターが盛んに分泌されていることがわかった。
languages.original_text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

traits.locale_text: ドアを開けると、コケのようなものが点々と付着した、奇妙なヌメヌメとした筋が天井から伸びている。さらに観察してみると、増殖スピードの早いカビの胞子を含むバイオマターが盛んに分泌されていることがわかった。

languages.text: Die Tür öffnet sich und gibt den Blick auf Schmierspuren eines merkwürdigen Schleims frei, durchzogen von Klumpen einer Substanz, die nach Moos aussieht. Von den Decken wachsen merkwürdige Gebilde. Eine nähere Inspektion zeigt, dass der Spiegel aktiv Biomasse absondert, darunter auch extrem schnell wachsende Schimmelsporen.
languages.original_text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

traits.locale_text: Die Tür öffnet sich und gibt den Blick auf Schmierspuren eines merkwürdigen Schleims frei, durchzogen von Klumpen einer Substanz, die nach Moos aussieht. Von den Decken wachsen merkwürdige Gebilde. Eine nähere Inspektion zeigt, dass der Spiegel aktiv Biomasse absondert, darunter auch extrem schnell wachsende Schimmelsporen.

languages.text: La porte s'ouvre pour révéler des filets d'une étrange substance gluante parsemée d'amas de ce qui semble être du lichen et des excroissances qui pendent du plafond. Un examen plus approfondi révèle que le miroir sécrète activement de la biomatière, dont des spores de moisissures à la croissance rapide.
languages.original_text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.

traits.locale_text: La porte s'ouvre pour révéler des filets d'une étrange substance gluante parsemée d'amas de ce qui semble être du lichen et des excroissances qui pendent du plafond. Un examen plus approfondi révèle que le miroir sécrète activement de la biomatière, dont des spores de moisissures à la croissance rapide.

languages.text: Kapı açıldığında; yosun benzeri şeylerin arasına serpilmiş, garip, sümüksü bir madde ve tavandan sarkan filizlerle karşılaşılıyor. Detaylı incelemeler sonucunda aynanın aktif bir şekilde biyomadde salgıladığı ve bu şeyler arasında hızla büyüyen küf sporlarının da olduğu ortaya çıkıyor.
languages.original_text: The door opens to reveal streaks of some odd slimy substance interspersed with clumps of what looks like moss, and growths hanging from the ceiling. Further inspection shows that the mirror is actively secreting biomatter, including fast-growing mould spores.
